verses.text: Conh b'itanec t'a tzalajk'olal d'ha Dios tz'ak'an quip. Conh awajec t'a tzalajk'olal sco b'itan ko Diosal a onh yinhtilal onh winhaj Jacob tik.
Conh b'itanec yet' pandereta yet' te' arpa wach' sk'anhi yet' pax salterio.
Co puec k'een trompeta ayic tz'alji k'een uj. Co puec pax k'een ayic sk'ojnaj k'een uj chi', yujto niwan q'uinh jun chi' t'ayonh.
Aton jun checnab'il ix yak' Dios t'ayonh a onh israel onh tik, a onh yinhtilal onh winhaj Jacob.
Ix alchaj t'ayonh yinhtilal onh winhaj José tik, ayic ix b'at Dios owal t'a Egipto. Ata' ix cab' jun lolonel, palta manh cojtacoc mach ix lolon chi'.
Ix yalan t'ayonh: Toxo ix wik'canel eyicatz t'a yich he patic. Toxo ix wik'canel jun munlajel te ya t'a eyib'anh.
Ix in eyavtejcoti ayic ayex och t'a syaelal, a inxo ix ex in colo'. Ix ex in tak'wej t'a skal asun ayic sk'anh k'u. Ix ex wak' prowal t'ha ha' yic Meriba.
Ex in chonhab', ab'ec tas swala', a in wan in lolon t'ayex. Ex israel, octom tzin he k'anab'ajej.
Malajocab' sdiosal heb' ch'oc chonhab'il ayek' t'ayex. Manh eyak'em he b'ha t'a juntzanh comon Dios chi'.
Ha in Jehová he Diosal in, a in ix ex wik'elta t'a yol yic Egipto. Jaquec he ti', ol ex in watzitej.
Palta maj yal he k'ol ix in he k'anab'ajej a ex in chonhab' Israel ex tik.
Yuj chi' ix ex wactejcan yuj he pital, ix eyak'an he gana icha snib'ej he k'ool.
Ex in chonhab' Israel, octom ix eyab' tas ix wala'. Octom ix he b'eyb'alej in checnab'il.
Ix am wak'och yaelal t'a yib'anh heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayex. Junnhej am mutz'satil ix aj in satanel heb'.
Ha heb' tzin yajaneli, toxonhej am nhojoji yek' heb' yuj xiwelal t'ayin. Axo syaelal heb', skan t'a yib'anh heb' t'a junelnhej.
Palta a exxo tik, ix am ex in watzitej. Ha am wal ixim trigo te wach' ix wak' t'ayex. Ix am wak' nok' yalchab' tz'elta t'a sattac k'een k'een eyuk'ej yic tzex tzalaji, xchi Jehová.
